titles.main_title: A SIMPLE GAME IN THE GALAXY...

questions.wrong_answer_prompt: Too bad, you're wrong this time...
questions.help_message: Answer only with the requested word(s), without any determiner, plural and so on.

identity.new_character_message: Well done... You try a new one ?
identity.noob: You'll do better with the next one...
identity.help_message: Choose one category, fill every active field with the requested year (watch out for the era !) or proper name then choose all needed affiliations.

daily.score_noob_questions: You should play a little more in questions mode to get this better...
daily.score_perfect_questions: Do you know the Wookiee by heart ? Well done !
daily.score_noob_identity: You shouldn't focus on starships only while watching movies...
daily.score_good_identity: Drink one glass less at the cantina and it'll be perfect !
daily.score_perfect_identity: You come back from a galaxy far, far away ? Well done !
